Package to.us.resume_builder.business.server_connect

Class PDFFacade

java.lang.Object
to.us.resume_builder.business.server_connect.PDFFacade
public class PDFFacade
extends java.lang.Object
Facade for communicating with the PDF-compiling server.

Example of Design Pattern: Facade

Author:
Micah

  • Method Details

    • getPDF

      public byte[] getPDF​(java.lang.String latex) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, FailedRequestException
      Compiles the given LaTeX string into a PDF.
      Parameters:
      latex - The LaTeX string to compile.
      Returns:
      The bytes of the resultant PDF.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted
      java.io.IOException - If an I/O exception occurs in sending or receiving.
      FailedRequestException - If the response indicates that an error occurred server-side.

    • uploadPDF

      public FileIOResponse uploadPDF​(java.lang.String latex) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, FailedRequestException
      Compiles the given LaTeX string into a PDF, which is uploaded to file.io.
      Parameters:
      latex - The LaTeX string to compile.
      Returns:
      file.io's response, or null if the response was corrupted.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted
      java.io.IOException - If an I/O exception occurs in sending or receiving.
      FailedRequestException - If the response indicates that an error occurred server-side.

    • catchError

      private <T> void catchError​(java.net.http.HttpResponse<T> resp, int successCode) throws FailedRequestException
      Checks the given response for a valid code, and throws a correct FailedRequestException if it does not measure up.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the response. Unused in the method, but present for general safety.
      Parameters:
      resp - The response to analyze for correctness
      successCode - The expected response code
      Throws:
      FailedRequestException - An exception with a properly-prepared message indicating what happened with the request.

    • getPDFHandle

      public static PDFFacade getPDFHandle()
      Offer access to the PDFFacade singleton.
      Returns:
      The handler for calls to the PDF Spring service.
